xxl.core.pipes.memoryManager
Interface MemoryMonitorable

All Known Subinterfaces:
MemoryManageable, MemoryManageableQueue<E>, SweepArea<E>, TemporalJoin.TemporalJoinSA<I>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBufferPipe, AbstractMemoryManageableQueue, AbstractSweepArea, BlockBasedBufferPipe, BufferPipe, Coalesce, Coalesce.CoalesceSA, CountBasedWindow, CountingSweepArea, DecoratorSweepArea, DefaultMemoryManageableSA, HeapSA, ImplementorBasedSweepArea, Join, ListSA, MemoryManageableListQueue, MemoryManageableSA, MultiWayEquiJoin, NestedTemporalWindow, NestedTemporalWindow.TemporalWindowSA, Orenstein.OrensteinSA, PlaneSweep.PlaneSA, SortMergeEquiJoinSA, SortMergeJoin.PredicateBasedSA, Split, Split.SplitSA, TemporalAggregator, TemporalAggregator.TemporalAggregatorSA, TemporalDifference, TemporalDifference.TemporalDifferenceSA, TemporalDistinct, TemporalDistinct.TemporalDistinctSA, TemporalGroupAndAggregator, TemporalGroupAndAggregator.TemporalGroupAndAggregatorSA, TemporalJoin, TemporalJoin.TemporalJoinHeapSA, TemporalJoin.TemporalJoinListSA, TemporalUnion, TemporalUnion.TemporalUnionSA
public interface MemoryMonitorable

Models an Object (e.g. an operator or a collection) whose memory usage can be monitored.

Field Summary
static String OBJECT_SIZE
          A constant that should be used as key to store the objectsize in the composite meta data if the object provides metadata.
static int SIZE_UNKNOWN
          A constant signing that the memory usage for an object is unknown.
 
Method Summary
 int getCurrentMemUsage()
          Returns the amount of memory, which is currently used by this object.
 

Field Detail

SIZE_UNKNOWN

static final int SIZE_UNKNOWN
A constant signing that the memory usage for an object is unknown.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

OBJECT_SIZE

static final String OBJECT_SIZE
A constant that should be used as key to store the objectsize in the composite meta data if the object provides metadata.

See Also:
MetaDataProvider-interface, Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getCurrentMemUsage

int getCurrentMemUsage()
Returns the amount of memory, which is currently used by this object. This method can be called from the strategy of the memory manager to obtain useful information for distributing main memory among the memory using objects.

Returns:
Returns the amount of memory currently used by this object (in bytes).
